bibdata.title: American National Standard Radiation Protection Instrumentation Test and Calibration, Portable Survey Instruments
American National Standard Radiation Protection Instrumentation Test and Calibration, Portable Survey Instruments

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Specific requirements are established for portable radiation protection instruments used for detection and measurement of levels of ionizing radiation fields or levels of radioactive surface contamination. An errata sheet for the standard is available at https://standards.ieee.org/content/dam/ieee-standards/standards/web/documents/erratas/N323A-1997_errata.pdf

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
